name: ppopen-appl-amr-fdm
description:
ppOpen-APPL/AMR-FDM is an adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) framework for
development of 3D parallel finite-difference method (FDM) applications.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
The HPC-X MPI implementation from NVIDIA/Mellanox based on OpenMPI. This
package is for external specs only.
